entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 02:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
